Background

I am a junior at Duke University pursuing a Computer Science degree and a minor in Visual Media Studies, with a Digital Intelligence Certificate. I am passionate about mobile application development, web programming, software engineering, and front-end implementation. Through my experiences working in software developing roles, I became more keen about implementing designs that enhance the user experience. I enjoy developing applications that are accessible and inclusive.

In my free time, you can find me dancing or enjoying the breeze at a lake!
